channel.title: Uke Along Artist » 5 Seconds Of Summer

item.title: 5 Seconds of Summer - Youngblood
item.description: This is for educational purposes only. This video is not to be used for performances.

item.title: 5 Seconds of Summer - Youngblood - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of Am (Raised a whole step from the original).
As performed by 5 Seconds of Summer.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Baritone Ukulele, available at ukefarm.com.
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Want to make a song suggestion? Follow the link and fill out the form! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvgacvP7hB46DGeJ8o6Gsn7V8JAPsHFo7G-Q4TkiHsILBiAw/viewform?usp=sf_link
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, and Spotify.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. Patreon rewards include access to my “method” of the video play alongs (to be used in a classroom) as well as some other resources, and starting in 2019, a chord sheet of every song that is posted as a play along.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!

item.title: 5 Seconds of Summer - Youngblood - Key of Am
item.description:
